Package edu.handong.csee.java.lab07.prob3

Class Attendence

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.handong.csee.java.lab07.prob3.Attendence

  • public class Attendence
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a student. This class contains information about student(ex: name, year grade, student ID and randomly assigned absent number) This class also checks if one can pass the class ( has less than 7 absent)
    Author:
    qpalzmm22

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Attendence​()
      This default constuctor sets name as empty string, year grade as 1 student id as 0000000 and randomly assign absent number
